name: TastyTower
description:
In this entry, you are a new recruit working at the Tasty Tower food truck! It is infamous in town for its questionable hygiene, though it doesn't stop hungry workers from coming back every lunch break. Your boss at Tasty Tower wants to see how well you perform on the first day at the job.

Gameplay
You have to successfully complete as many orders as you can in the given time.
Each order is broken down into a list of ingredients, and you have to correctly stack each ingredient on top off each other.
Lobbing an ingredient starts a combo, which multiplies your score. The combo breaks when the ingredient misses the plate.

Controls
Use the mouse and hold left-click to drag the requested ingredients onto the plate. The ingredients keep their inertia if you release the click.
